sensory_systems.name: Advanced Dough Rheology Sensor
sensory_systems.description: A multi-modal sensor array capable of continuously monitoring dough properties in real-time – temperature, shear rate, viscosity, elasticity, gluten development, and protein composition. Utilizes a combination of shear stress sensors, optical sensors (Raman spectroscopy for protein analysis), and ultrasonic sensors.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Shear Rate: ±0.1 Pa·s, Viscosity (Brookfield): ±0.5 cP, Protein Content (Raman): ±1% relative to target, Gluten Development (Raman): ±0.3% relative to target

sensory_systems.name: Flavor Mapping & Predictive Sensory Analysis
sensory_systems.description: Uses hyperspectral imaging and AI to analyze the chemical composition of the baked product and predict sensory attributes (sweetness, sourness, aroma, crust color). Models trained on vast datasets of sensory data correlated with ingredient composition.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Flavor Prediction (Sweetness): ±0.3 pH units, Aroma Prediction (Odor Units): ±0.8 OUs, Crust Color Prediction (ΔE): ±0.2

sensory_systems.name: Automated Smell Detection & Analysis
sensory_systems.description: Microfluidic sensor arrays combined with machine learning algorithms capable of identifying and quantifying volatile organic compounds (VOCs) produced during baking. Focuses on identifying key aroma compounds contributing to the final baked product.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: VOC Detection (ppm): ±10 ppm, Aroma Compound Identification (VOCs): ±15% relative to target compound concentration

control_systems.name: Adaptive PID Control System
control_systems.description: A multi-axis, high-frequency control system managing temperature, humidity, mixing speed, and oven rotation. Adaptive algorithms adjust based on real-time sensory feedback and model predictions.
control_systems.capabilities: Precise temperature regulation (±0.1°C), dynamic speed adjustments, automated ingredient dispensing, and intelligent oven rotation for even baking.

control_systems.name: Reinforcement Learning Control
control_systems.description: Utilizes reinforcement learning to optimize baking parameters (time, temperature profiles) based on long-term sensory outcomes – maximizing crust quality and overall flavor complexity. Requires significant training data and computational power.
control_systems.capabilities: Automated parameter tuning, discovery of novel baking profiles, adaptability to different dough formulations.

mechanical_systems.name: Robotic Dough Handling System
mechanical_systems.description: A collaborative robot (cobot) equipped with tactile sensors and precise dispensing mechanisms for handling dough, ingredient addition, and shaping. Requires advanced computer vision for object recognition.
mechanical_systems.specifications: Payload Capacity: 5-10 kg, Repeatability: ±1mm, Operating Speed: 5-10 m/min

mechanical_systems.name: 3D-Printed Dough Shaping System
mechanical_systems.description: Utilizes extrusion-based 3D printing to create complex dough shapes with high precision. Requires specialized nozzle design and material formulation for dough extrusion.
mechanical_systems.specifications: Layer Resolution: 0.1mm, Build Volume: 300mm x 200mm x 150mm

mechanical_systems.name: Automated Oven Rotation Mechanism
mechanical_systems.description: A motorized system that precisely rotates the baking chamber based on sensor feedback and control algorithms, ensuring uniform heat distribution.

software_integration.name: Digital Twin of the Baking Process
software_integration.description: A virtual representation of the entire baking process, continuously updated with real-time sensor data and model predictions. Used for simulation, optimization, and predictive maintenance.
software_integration.capabilities: Process simulation, parameter optimization, anomaly detection, and remote monitoring.

software_integration.name: AI-Powered Recipe Generation & Adaptation
software_integration.description: Software that automatically generates new dough recipes based on desired flavor profiles and adapts existing recipes based on ingredient availability and sensory feedback.  Utilizes generative AI models.
software_integration.capabilities: Recipe optimization, ingredient substitution suggestions, and dynamic adaptation to changing conditions.
